timeline.message: set jdk.disabled.namedCurves to resolved the issue of jdK14 unavailable
add jdk14 travis ci
update build.gradle to suitable jdK14
update publish web3sdk version

Merge pull request #699 from ywy2090/dev

set jdk.disabled.namedCurves to resolved the issue of jdK14 unavailable
Table.sol getUint update

Merge pull request #700 from ywy2090/dev

Table.sol getUint update
update release_node.txt and ChangeLog.md
update abi wrapper

Merge pull request #701 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

update release_node.txt and ChangeLog.md
add async method for CRUD Service

Merge pull request #703 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

add async method for CRUD Service
add getBlockLimit and Deprecated getBlockNumberCache
fix queryCNS when constructor Contract object
fix integTest bug

Merge pull request #704 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

add getBlockLimit and Deprecated getBlockNumberCache
update getAddress compatible with 03 04 public key
fix ABIDefinition.isConstant bug when using solc 0.6.10
add failedTxSum field
add interface ret receipt for precompiled service
fix getConsensusStatus response decode exception bug
add interface ret receipt for consensus precompiled service
add seq info for timeout message
remove throw TransactionException when it's not necessary
add TransactionReceipt to TransactionException
gradle update

Merge pull request #706 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

update getAddress compatible with 03 04 public key
remove . of Transaction receipt timeout message

Merge pull request #710 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

remove . of Transaction receipt timeout message
update StatusCode

Merge pull request #712 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

update StatusCode
